column4: installing ubuntu on a system with no CD/Disk drive, I switched the harddrive out into a system with CD drive, installed, worked fine, but when replacing the HD to its orig system X won't start
the vid card is different, is there a way to get ubuntu to auto-detect the new card?
probably because your X configuration is set up for the old one.  dpkg-reconfigure xserver-xorg   You can also install over the network,etc directly on that computer
